publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-2395 Ms Margaret Curran on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau:Designation of Lead Committeeâ€”That the Parliament agrees that the Justice 1 Committee be designated as lead committee in consideration of Part 1 Land Reform ( Scotland) Act 2003: Draft Guidance for Local Authorities and National Park Authorities (SE/2005/14).
